summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 PACIFIC COACHWORKS RAGEN (NA). WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 25 MPH, THERE WAS AN ABNORMAL NOISE COMING FROM THE REAR BRAKES. THE FAILURE RECURRED SEVERAL TIMES. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A DEALER, WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE BOLT AND THE BRAKE SPRING FRACTURED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 137,000.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 PACIFIC COACH WORTH POWERLITE TRAILER (N/A). THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 35 MPH, THE BRAKE WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED AND THE BRAKES BECAME UNRESPONSIVE.  THE FAILURE RECURRED INTERMITTENTLY. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC FOR DIAGNOSIS. THE MECHANIC STATED THAT THE WHEEL BEARINGS ON ALL FOUR WHEELS WOULD HAVE TO BE REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 2,800.   *TR
